remarks: Two linear Hilbert space operators are equal iff their quadratic forms are equal.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Jul-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lnopeq $p |- ( ( T e. LinOp /\ U e. LinOp ) -> ( A. x e. ~H ( ( T ` x ) .ih x ) = ( ( U ` x ) .ih x ) <-> T = U ) ) $.
$d T x $.
$d U x $.
